name: Guardin' Plants
description:
Evil Corp's new robots have been destroying forest after forest, but Mother Oak, protector of her magical forest, is going to fight back!

Guardian' Plants is a 3D tower-defense strategy game where you assist Mother Oak in defending her forest from the invading robots. Plant and care for magical plants and mushrooms which will attack and add status affects to the robots. Prevent the evil robots from destroying Mother Oak for five in game days to achieve victory.

Development Team:

  • Adelaide Barcalow
  • Bailey Bush
  • Brody Schwartz
  • Joseph Miller
  • Kevin Beallis

Special Thanks to Jake Gwinn for creating our soundtrack.
